text: Anatoly Nikolayevich Berezovoy (, 11 March 1942 â€“ 20 September 2014) was a Soviet cosmonaut. Berezovoy was born in Enem, Adyghe Autonomous Oblast, Russian SFSR in a Ukrainian family. He had two children. On 27 April 1970 he was selected as a cosmonaut and flew as Commander on Soyuz T-5. He retired on 31 October 1992 due to medical reasons after injuries he received as a victim of an armed robbery. From 1992 to 1999, he was a Deputy President Russian Space Federation. Berezovoy died on September 20, 2014 in Moscow, Russia, aged 72. ==Other websites== Category:1942 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Soviet colonels Category:Cosmonauts Category:Recipients of the Order of Lenin Category:Russian crime victims
title: Anatoly Berezovoy
